elements.text:
As you're getting into the shower, you see a huge spider on the wall. You turn away for a second and look back and realize it's gone. 

Here are some feelings that might happen in the moment:

texts: I'm grossed out, but remind myself that the spider probably can't hurt me.
I'm calm as I get into the shower.
I'm anxious about getting into the shower, but know I can overcome my fear.
I'm scared the spider will show up when I least expect it.
